Text: This is not the new episode. it is the one where rayan wants to move out of her parents home into the house they bought for JJ and her  from earlier this season.  Don't know how the mix up occurred.  oh well.

Since the CBC was left out of the deal between local stations and the cable companies, it's gotta go dig up more cash. The word still that Little Mosque will be back but they will be only be able to shoot probably half the usual number of shows. Begs the question why bother?
